pullrequest.title: First version of Displays widget with sample DisplayPlugins

content.raw:
Yeah I didn’t put too much time into refactoring the common grid code out between the two plugins because I imagined the same fate for Grid3D one day :slight_smile: 

I am open to shifting the RTF display out of this repo at some point \(it will also be good for testing the typical “user” experience of registering downstream plugins\)

‌

Appreciate the review; more PRs on their way!
